message: No user interviews conducted. Research cannot proceed without user input.
corrective_action: STOP all other research activities. Organize and conduct user interviews immediately.

message: No Problem Statement defined. All research needs a clear problem to solve.
corrective_action: Revisit Step 02 (Understand). Use the problem-statement template to create one.

message: Fewer than 3 competitive benchmarks. Insufficient competitive understanding.
corrective_action: Analyze at least 5 competitors using the competitive-analysis template.

message: No hypotheses formulated. Research has no direction without hypotheses to test.
corrective_action: Define at least 3 testable hypotheses using Assumption Mapping.

message: No personas created. User understanding is not formalized.
corrective_action: Create at least 2 personas using the persona template.

message: Research data may be stale. Last interview was over 30 days ago.
corrective_action: Consider refreshing research data with additional interviews.

message: Less than 50% of hypotheses validated. Problem-solution fit is weak.
corrective_action: Re-evaluate the Problem Statement. Consider pivoting or conducting additional research.
